alert.note: Alert for Roanoke (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Roanoke , the City of Salem and the City of Roanoke through 415 PM EDT... At 345 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Glenvar, or near Salem, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Roanoke... Salem... Vinton... Glenvar... Hollins... Poages Mill... and Cave Spring. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
